column5: Looks like Nippissing is just about totally frozen over, that'll make the hut ops and anglers happy for a Jan 1st start to the season.  http://coastwatch.glerl.noaa.gov/modis/mod...on.143.250m.jpg
The docks are good to go aswell bud.
Its frozen all right -20 here this morning, but I still have a cardinal rule... no venturing out on that lake till Jan.
YOU MAY VENTURE, BUT YOU MAY NOT FISH TIL JAN.
they are too, but got to remember, while fishing from the dock, you're not "ice fishing", you're a land lubber and can only use one rod.
Almost 8"...saw a shack going out this morning!
Where was it that you measured 8 inches of ice? Was it an outfitter that was pulling the huts out so he would be ready for the opener?
I measured 8" yesterday at the mouth of Kervin bay.  The hut I saw going across was for personal use, but the outfitters are strating to bring out their huts too.
Here's a good shot from today.
Good morning Wayne, could post a link to the site where you found that image. I have been trying to find current satelite images but can only find old stuff.  Thanks KW Mike
Thanks Randy, guess I should have looked at the link in the first post.  KW Mike
Rob Hyatt has 8" of ice around his place and the huts are going out on the 26th. Should be a good oepner.
